content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Iron Plate Smelting Setup at position (52.0, -79.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (52.0, -79.0) (no ingredients to smelt)
- Burner inserter at position (53.5, -79.5) (out of fuel)
- Wooden chest at position (54.5, -79.5) (contains iron plates)
- Burner inserter at position (55.5, -78.5) (out of fuel)
- Wooden chest at position (56.5, -78.5)

#### Iron Ore Mining Setup at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) (out of fuel)
- Wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-13.5, -48.5) (waiting for source items)
- Burner inserter at position (-12.5, -48.5) (waiting for source items)

#### Storage Area at position (0.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (0.5, 0.5) (contains various items)
- Wooden chest at position (1.5, 0.5) (contains various items)
- Wooden chest at position (2.5, 0.5) (contains coal)
- Wooden chest at position (3.5, 0.5) (contains coal)
- Wooden chest at position (4.5, 0.5) (contains coal and iron ore)
- Wooden chest at position (5.5, 0.5) (contains iron ore, plates, and gear wheels)

### ERROR TIPS

#### Mining drill not working due to lack of fuel
- Ensure the burner mining drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) is fueled with coal to resume operation.

#### Inserters out of fuel
- Fuel the burner inserters at positions (53.5, -79.5) and (55.5, -78.5) with coal to enable them to function.

#### Furnace has no ingredients to smelt
- Supply the stone furnace at position (52.0, -79.0) with iron ore and ensure the inserter is fueled to transfer items.

#### Chest at drop position is full
- Empty the wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) to allow the mining drill to continue mining iron ore.

#### AssertionError: Mining drill not working
- Ensure the mining drill is fueled and operational before asserting its status.

### NAMESPACE

#### Utility Functions
- None defined yet.

#### Important Variables
- `drill`: BurnerMiningDrill object at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- `inventory`: Dictionary containing current inventory items
- `entities`: List of entities on the map with their positions and statuses
